channel.title: The Between: Ghosts of El Paso available to Patreon Supporters
channel.description:
**The Between: Ghosts of El Paso is currently available to Gauntlet Patreon Supporters!** *Ghosts of El Paso* is based on *The Between* and uses *The Between* rulebook. *Ghosts of El Paso* is a haunted western game about a town's vigilance committee coping with hauntings around the mysterious and supernatural Season of the Wounded Night that occurs every six years! The *Ghosts of El Paso* includes the 6 playbooks and 10 threats. Check it out today!
Support the Gauntlet on our Patreon here to get in on *Ghosts of El Paso*: https://www.patreon.com/gauntlet Join the conversation on *Ghosts of El Paso* on the Gauntlet Publishing Discord here: https://discord.gg/D8m2R3e7Ms
